article.headline: Bucknell 67, La Salle 66
article.story: LEWISBURG, Pa. (AP) -- John Griffin scored 21 points and hit two free throws with eight seconds remaining to lift Bucknell to a come-from-behind 67-66 victory over La Salle on Monday. Patrick Behan and Justin Castleberry each added 18 points for Bucknell (3-4), which trailed by 12 points at the half and by nine with five minutes to play. Darnell Harris scored 25 points, including seven of 12 3-point attempts, to lead La Salle (3-3). The Explorers went on a 27-8 run in the first half for a 39-23 lead with 1:35 left in the period. Bucknell whittled the advantage to 39-27 at the break and scored the first six points of the second half to pull to 39-33. They made it 54-50 on Darryl Shazier's basket with 7:30 left. Sherman Diaz hit a pair of 3-pointers to give La Salle a 64-55 lead with 5:21 left, but the Bison went on a 12-2 run to end the game. Todd O'Brien grabbed an offensive rebound and hit a basket to make it 66-65 with 43 seconds left. Griffin was fouled and hit both ends of a 1-and-1 to give the Bison their first lead since they were ahead 15-12.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
